body:
<!-- Thanks for filing an issue! Before hitting the button, please answer these questions.-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT?**

Yes

**What?**

It seems that [hasJump()](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/pkg/proxy/iptables/proxier_test.go#L507) in proxier_test.go do some wrong matches. It failed some test cases I designed.

1.  

```
rules : []iptablestest.Rule{
	    iptablestest.Rule{"--dport ":"3001", "-p ":"tcp", "-j ":"REJECT"},
	},
	destChain: "REJECT",
	destIP: "1.2.3.4",
	destPort: "3001",
```

expect **true**, but got **false**.

but, 

```
rules : []iptablestest.Rule{
	    iptablestest.Rule{"--dport ":"3001", "-p ":"tcp", "-j ":"REJECT"},
	},
	destChain: "REJECT",
	destIP: "",
	destPort: "3001",
```

will got **true** as expected.

2. 

```
rules : []iptablestest.Rule{
	    iptablestest.Rule{"-d ":"10.20.30.41/32", "--dport ":"80", "-p ":"tcp", "-j ":"REJECT"},
	},
	destChain: "REJECT",
	destIP: "10.20.30.41",
	destPort: "8081",
```

expect **false**, but got **true**.

3. immediately return **false** when first rule fail to match even though second rule will **match**

```
rules : []iptablestest.Rule{
	    iptablestest.Rule{"-d ":"10.20.30.41/32", "--dport ":"80", "-p ":"tcp", "-j ":"REJECT"},
            iptablestest.Rule{"-d ":"1.2.3.4/32", -p ":"tcp", "-j ":"REJECT"},
	},
	destChain: "REJECT",
	destIP: "1.2.3.4",
        destPort: "",
```

expect **true**, but got **false**.

@thockin @bprashanth 

Am I right? If so, I will send a PR to fix it.

Thanks!
title: [Kube-proxy] hasJump() in proxier_test.go has bug?
